snippet: Across the country, state-level campaigns fight the influence of big money and gerrymandered congressional districts....
abstract: Op-Ed article by Herick Smith calls attention to groundswell of support across United State for reform of electoral system, particularly against unlimited corporate campaign contributions and gerrymandering; notes that 17 states have become battlegrounds over these issues.
lead_paragraph: Across the country, state-level campaigns fight the influence of big money and gerrymandered congressional districts.

headline.print_headline: Can the States Save American Democracy?
headline.main: Can the States Save American Democracy?
